title: How to Fold a Rabbit Wash Cloth

steps.title: Fold the washcloth in half to form a triangle.
steps.content: Fold the washcloth in half to form a triangle. The washcloth must be square or squared off.

steps.title: Roll the washcloth from the right angle corner to the long opposite side.
steps.content: Roll the washcloth from the right angle corner to the long opposite side.

steps.title: Fold the rolled washcloth in half.
steps.content: Fold the rolled washcloth in half.

steps.title: Fold the washcloth in half again.
steps.content: Fold the washcloth in half again. Fold the loose ends back towards fold to start the ears .

steps.title: Place the rubber-band around the washcloth 2 inches (5 cm) from the fold.
steps.content: Place the rubber-band around the washcloth 2 inches (5 cm) from the fold. Cover the rubber-band with ribbon . If giving as a gift, glue eyes and pom-pom (nose) on to the finished bunny to bring it to life.
